nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
中华人民共和国中央人民政府
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关，即中央人民政府，是最高国家权力机关全国人民代表大会的执行机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China, i.e., the Central People's Government, and the executive organ of the National People's Congress, the highest organ of state power.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The highest organ of state power in the People's Republic of China.

en: Government Administration Council of the Central People's Government

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的前身，是1949年至1954年间的国家政务的最高执行机关。
description.en: The predecessor of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, it was the highest executive body for state affairs from 1949 to 1954.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1954年)

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1954年)
en: 1954 Constitution of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第一部宪法，于1954年9月20日在第一届全国人民代表大会第一次会议上通过。该宪法规定设立国务院以取代中央人民政府政务院。
description.en: The first constitution of the People's Republic of China, passed on September 20, 1954, at the First Session of the First National People's Congress. This constitution stipulated the establishment of the State Council to replace the Government Administration Council of the Central People's Government.

en: Constitution of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的根本大法，规定了国家的根本制度和根本任务。现行宪法为1982年宪法，并历经数次修正。
description.en: The fundamental law of the People's Republic of China, which stipulates the country's fundamental system and tasks. The current constitution is the 1982 constitution, which has undergone several amendments.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院组织法

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院组织法
en: Organic Law of the State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 规定中华人民共和国国务院组织制度和工作制度的法律。
description.en: A law that stipulates the organizational and working systems of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

en: Working Rules of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 规范中华人民共和国国务院日常工作及活动的行政法规。
description.en: Administrative regulations that standardize the daily work and activities of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 第五届全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 第五届全国人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the 5th National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 第五届全国人民代表大会的常设机关。1982年5月，其第23次会议决定对国务院组成人员进行重大调整，增设国务委员职务。
description.en: The standing body of the 5th National People's Congress. In May 1982, its 23rd session decided on a major adjustment to the composition of the State Council, creating the position of State Councilor.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务委员

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的组成人员，是国家级副职领导人，行政待遇与副总理同级。
description.en: A member of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, a state leader at the deputy level, with administrative rank equivalent to a Vice Premier.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家、军事家、外交家，中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要领导人之一，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese statesman, military leader, and diplomat who was one of the main leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, serving as the Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要领导人之一，曾任国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, one of the main leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as Vice Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国军事家、政治家，中华人民共和国元帅，曾任国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese military leader and politician, Marshal of the People's Republic of China, who served as Vice Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国军事家、政治家，中华人民共和国元帅，曾任国务院副总理。

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家、军事家、外交家，中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心，曾任国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, military leader, and diplomat, the core of the second-generation central leadership collective of the Communist Party of China, who served as Vice Premier of the State Council.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 根据《中华人民共和国宪法》，国务院是最高国家权力机关全国人民代表大会的执行机关。
description.en: According to the Constitution of the People's Republic of China, the State Council is the executive organ of the National People's Congress, the highest organ of state power.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1954年)
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 1954年宪法规定设立国务院，取代了原中央人民政府政务院的行政职能。
description.en: The 1954 Constitution stipulated the establishment of the State Council, which replaced the administrative functions of the former Government Administration Council of the Central People's Government.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1954年)

description.zh-cn: 1954年宪法规定设立国务院，取代了原中央人民政府政务院的行政职能。
description.en: The 1954 Constitution stipulated the establishment of the State Council, which replaced the administrative functions of the former Government Administration Council of the Central People's Government.

relationships.source: 第五届全国人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 1982年5月4日，第五届全国人大常委会第二十三次会议决定对国务院组成人员进行重大调整，增设国务委员职务。
description.en: On May 4, 1982, the 23rd session of the Standing Committee of the 5th National People's Congress decided on a major adjustment to the composition of the State Council, creating the position of State Councilor.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 在周恩来病逝后，接任国务院代总理，后为总理。
description.en: After Zhou Enlai's death, he took over as Acting Premier of the State Council, and later as Premier.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 1975年1月起任副总理，1976年2月2日起任代总理，1976年4月7日起任总理，1980年9月10日辞职。
description.en: Served as Vice Premier from January 1975, Acting Premier from February 2, 1976, Premier from April 7, 1976, and resigned on September 10, 1980.

description.zh-cn: 接替辞职的华国锋出任国务院总理。
description.en: Succeeded Hua Guofeng, who resigned, as Premier of the State Council.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 1980年增补为副总理，同年9月接任总理；1987年11月辞去总理职务。
description.en: Appointed as Vice Premier in 1980, and succeeded as Premier in September of the same year; resigned as Premier in November 1987.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理、全国人大常委会委员长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 在赵紫阳辞职后，出任国务院代总理。
description.en: After Zhao Ziyang's resignation, he became Acting Premier of the State Council.

中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 于2018年2月被撤职。
description.en: Was removed from office in February 2018.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 于2023年10月被免职。
description.en: Was removed from office in October 2023.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 于2023年10月被免职。
description.en: Was removed from office in October 2023.
